text:
Kensington High Street buzzing with people & cars, and Holland Park packed with people sunbathing, having picnics & hanging with friends. 
The lockdown's collapsing in the absence of leadership. Either Boris must take charge again asap - or he must pass power to someone else.

domain.name: Person
domain.description: Named people in the world like Nelson Mandela
